00087 Traces::Traces(void)
00088   : m_bTraceAll(false),
00089     m_pcliStream(NULL)
00090 {
00091     EnsureCommonDevices();
00092 
00093     // Register TRACE_TRACES.
00094     m_mapClasses[TRACE_TRACES.GetName()] = TraceClassFlag(TRACE_TRACES, m_bTraceAll);
00095 }
00096 
00097 Traces::~Traces(void)
00098 {
00099     if (cli::OutputDevice* const pcli_Stream = m_pcliStream)
00100     {
00101         m_pcliStream = NULL;
00102         pcli_Stream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__);
00103         pcli_Stream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 const OutputDevice& Traces::GetStream(void) const
00108 {
00109     if (m_pcliStream != NULL)
00110     {
00111         return *m_pcliStream;
00112     }
00113     else
00114     {
00115         // Default to stderr.
00116         return OutputDevice::GetStdErr();
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 const bool Traces::SetStream(OutputDevice& CLI_Stream)
00121 {
00122     // Free previous reference.
00123     if (cli::OutputDevice* const pcli_Stream = m_pcliStream)
00124     {
00125         bool b_Res = true;
00126 
00127         // Unreference the device right now.
00128         m_pcliStream = NULL;
00129         if (! pcli_Stream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00130         {
00131             b_Res = false;
00132         }
00133         pcli_Stream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00134 
00135         if (! b_Res)
00136         {
00137             // Abort on error
00138             return false;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     // Store next reference.
00143     {
00144         CLI_Stream.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00145         if (! CLI_Stream.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00146         {
00147             // Store nothing on error.
00148             CLI_Stream.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00149             return false;
00150         }
00151         // Do not store the reference until opening is done.
00152         m_pcliStream = & CLI_Stream;
00153     }
00154 
00155     return true;
00156 }
00157 
00158 const TraceClass::List Traces::GetAllClasses(void) const
00159 {
00160     // Retrieve current filter.
00161     TraceClass::List q_Classes;
00162     for (   ClassMap::const_iterator it = m_mapClasses.begin();
00163             it != m_mapClasses.end();
00164             it ++)
00165     {
00166         q_Classes.push_back(it->second);
00167     }
00168     return q_Classes;
00169 }
00170 
00171 const TraceClass::List Traces::GetCurrentFilter(void) const
00172 {
00173     // Retrieve current filter.
00174     TraceClass::List q_CurrentFilter;
00175     for (   ClassMap::const_iterator it = m_mapClasses.begin();
00176             it != m_mapClasses.end();
00177             it ++)
00178     {
00179         if (it->second.IsVisible())
00180         {
00181             q_CurrentFilter.push_back(it->second);
00182         }
00183     }
00184     return q_CurrentFilter;
00185 }
00186 
00187 const bool Traces::SetFilter(const TraceClass& CLI_Class, const bool B_ShowTraces)
00188 {
00189     // Check the class exists.
00190     ClassMap::const_iterator it = m_mapClasses.find(CLI_Class.GetName());
00191     if (it != m_mapClasses.end())
00192     {
00193         if (it->second.IsVisible() != B_ShowTraces)
00194         {
00195             // Set the flag.
00196             m_mapClasses[CLI_Class.GetName()] = TraceClassFlag(it->second, B_ShowTraces);
00197             TraceFilterState(CLI_Class, B_ShowTraces);
00198         }
00199         return true;
00200     }
00201 
00202     return false;
00203 }
00204 
00205 const bool Traces::SetAllFilter(const bool B_ShowTraces)
00206 {
00207     // Remember 'all filter configuration'.
00208     m_bTraceAll = B_ShowTraces;
00209     BeginTrace(TRACE_TRACES) << "All traces " << (B_ShowTraces ? "enabled" : "disabled") << endl;
00210 
00211     // Trace traces modifications.
00212     SetFilter(TRACE_TRACES, true);
00213 
00214     // Then adapt every filter configuration.
00215     for (   ClassMap::const_iterator it = m_mapClasses.begin();
00216             it != m_mapClasses.end();
00217             it ++)
00218     {
00219         if (! SetFilter(it->second, B_ShowTraces))
00220         {
00221             return false;
00222         }
00223     }
00224 
00225     // Set final traces settings.
00226     SetFilter(TRACE_TRACES, B_ShowTraces);
00227 
00228     return true;
00229 }
00230 
00231 const OutputDevice& Traces::Trace(const TraceClass& CLI_Class)
00232 {
00233     bool b_ShowTrace = false;
00234 
00235     ClassMap::const_iterator it = m_mapClasses.find(CLI_Class.GetName());
00236     if (it != m_mapClasses.end())
00237     {
00238         b_ShowTrace = it->second.IsVisible();
00239     }
00240     else
00241     {
00242         // Show this new trace class depending on the trace all configuration.
00243         b_ShowTrace = m_bTraceAll;
00244 
00245         // Remember this new class.
00246         m_mapClasses[CLI_Class.GetName()] = TraceClassFlag(CLI_Class, b_ShowTrace);
00247         TraceFilterState(CLI_Class, b_ShowTrace);
00248     }
00249 
00250     if (b_ShowTrace)
00251     {
00252         return BeginTrace(CLI_Class);
00253     }
00254     else
00255     {
00256         return OutputDevice::GetNullDevice();
00257     }
00258 }
00259 
00260 const OutputDevice& Traces::BeginTrace(const TraceClass& CLI_Class)
00261 {
00262     return (GetStream() << "<" << CLI_Class.GetName() << "> ");
00263 }
00264 
00265 const bool Traces::TraceFilterState(const TraceClass& CLI_Class, const bool B_ShowTraces)
00266 {
00267     // Trace this new class state.
00268     (   (CLI_Class == TRACE_TRACES) ? BeginTrace(TRACE_TRACES) : Trace(TRACE_TRACES))
00269         << "Trace <" << CLI_Class.GetName() << "> "
00270         << "-> " << (B_ShowTraces ? "on" : "off") << endl;
00271 
00272     return true;
00273 }

00278 {

00291 Traces::TraceClassFlag& Traces::TraceClassFlag::operator=(const Traces::TraceClassFlag& CLI_Class)
00292 {
00293     TraceClass::operator=(CLI_Class);
00294     m_bShow = CLI_Class.IsVisible();
00295     return *this;
00296 }

00298 const bool Traces::TraceClassFlag::IsVisible(void) const
00299 {
00300     return m_bShow;
